title: A Walk With Mom
description: Mother's Day is a special holiday for children and their families. In A Walk With Mom, Sam and his mom celebrate Mother's Day by taking a walk through the woods. While reading this story, students will have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the story elements of character and setting. Detailed illustrations, repetitive text, and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: picked, popped, ripe, strawberry, wild, woods
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Story Elements : Identify characters and setting
Initial and Final Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
Quotation Marks : Understand and use quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
